mapper.insert: insert into submission ( id, helper_id, name, short_description, full_description, search_tags, shop_type, open_hours, district, address, phone, latitude1000000, longitude1000000, photo_url ) values ( #{id}::uuid, #{helperId}::uuid, #{name}, #{shortDescription}, #{fullDescription}, #{searchTags}, #{shopType}::shop_type, #{openHours}, #{district}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{latitude1000000}, #{longitude1000000}, #{photoUrl} )
mapper.select: select id, helper_id as helperId, shop_id as shopId, name, short_description as shortDescription, full_description as fullDescription, search_tags as searchTags, shop_type as shopType, open_hours as openHours, district, address, phone, latitude1000000, longitude1000000, photo_url as photoUrl, reject_count as rejectCount, serious_reject_count as seriousRejectCount, accept_count as acceptCount, is_processed as isProcessed from submission where id = #{id}::uuid

select (case when s.shop_id is null then #{CREATE_TYPE,javaType=int} else #{UPDATE_TYPE,javaType=int} end) as submissionType, s.id as submissionId, coalesce(shop.name, s.name) as shopName, coalesce(shop.short_description, s.short_description) as shopShortDesc from submission s left join shop on s.shop_id = shop.id where is_processed = false
and ( s.search_tags like '%' || #{searchWord,javaType=String} || '%' or s.name like '%' || #{searchWord,javaType=String} || '%' or s.short_description like '%' || #{searchWord,javaType=String} || '%' or s.full_description like '%' || #{searchWord,javaType=String} || '%' or s.address like '%' || #{searchWord,javaType=String} || '%' or s.phone like '%' || #{searchWord,javaType=String} || '%'
or shop.search_tags like '%' || #{searchWord,javaType=String} || '%' or shop.name like '%' || #{searchWord,javaType=String} || '%' or shop.short_description like '%' || #{searchWord,javaType=String} || '%' or shop.full_description like '%' || #{searchWord,javaType=String} || '%' or shop.address like '%' || #{searchWord,javaType=String} || '%' or shop.phone like '%' || #{searchWord,javaType=String} || '%' )
and (s.district = #{district,javaType=int} or shop.district = #{district,javaType=int} )
and (s.shop_type = #{shopType,javaType=String}::shop_type or shop.shop_type = #{shopType,javaType=String}::shop_type )
ORDER BY random() LIMIT #{MAX_CREATE_UPDATE_SUBMISSION_RECORD_LIMIT,javaType=int}
mapper.insert: insert into submission_response(submission_id, helper_id, response ) values (#{submissionId}::uuid, #{helperId}::uuid, #{responseId})
mapper.update:
update submission set reject_count = reject_count + #{rejectIncrement,javaType=int}, serious_reject_count = serious_reject_count + #{seriousRejectIncrement,javaType=int}, accept_count = accept_count + #{acceptIncrement,javaType=int},
is_processed = true,
last_update_time = current_timestamp where id = #{id,javaType=String}::uuid and is_processed = false
